name: Bluelight
headline: Analytics, built for the trades.
description: Bluelight gives home service contractors the power of real-time data to optimize and scale their business.

founders.name: Alex Dixon, Founder
founders.description:
Currently building Bluelight - analytics, built for the trades.
Learn more at usebluelight.com

founders.name: Stewart Lamke, Founder
founders.description: Worked in revenue management and strategy.  Passionate about using analytics to drive great decision making.

# Transform field data into action
Built for home service contractors: optimize operations, boost efficiency, and grow revenue.

TRUSTED BY LEADING SHOPS

Furr customer logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/6792e804a79647029bed2e12_logo-furr.png)![WyattWorks customer logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/6792e804e49c5d2b147b58cc_logo-wyatt.png)![Service Professionals customer logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/6792e804a5be3c611426da1a_logo-servicepros.png)![Metro customer logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/6792e804005f240a914b832a_logo-metro.png)![Alphalete customer logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/6792e80481bb1fd5f8cbbc54_logo-alphalete.png)
Product
## Finally have confidence in your metrics
We understand how frustrating it is to juggle daily operations with data and reports. Give your teams easy access to reliable numbers and live information.
[Getting reliable business metrics doesn't need to be hardBluelight brings the benefits of real-time analytics to your team without getting in the way of daily business operations.Learn more](https://usebluelight.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Your home base for tracking business performanceDon't be a slave to reporting. We provide consistent, reliable insights so you can focus on growing your business.Learn more](https://usebluelight.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Bluelight replaces your legacy reporting systemsPrevious generation analytics are general purpose. With Bluelight, you get a solution that can keep up with the trades.Learn more](https://usebluelight.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)

![Card showing total revenue performance.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/66919468544487bf3550a680_card-total-revenue.png)![Chart showing revenue performance vs. goal.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/6691985a4992dc540c416946_card-revenue-performance.png)![Card showing number of working days left.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/66919440ae17b629801992d8_card-working-days.png)![Business owner viewing his laptop.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/676ff0bd658b0cbe5eecc9fa_asset-person-laptop.png)

Our metrics are dialed with Bluelight. They designed this for our industry.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/676ff335bb2339da86adb635_BLUELIGHT_QUOTE%20MARK_LEFT_ORANGE.svg)
![Seth Wyatt owner of WyattWorks plumbing.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/669176ecc0702e58040a7988_avatar-seth-wyatt.png)
**Seth Wyatt**
Owner at WyattWorks Plumbing
Features
## Built for the trades
Powerful, easy-to-use business analytics to help you plan, optimize, and grow your revenue. Trusted by industry leaders.
Daily Huddle
Start the day off strong with dashboards and tools specifically designed for your Daily Huddle.
Budget & Goal Tracking
Understand the impact key performance drivers have on your revenue growth.
Capacity Planning
Quantify missed revenue opportunities and optimize service using real-time booking limits.
Demand Forecasts
Use call and web booking data to predict future demand to allocate resources effectively.
Real-time Metrics
Gain real-time insights that never go out of date and can truly keep up with the trades.
Single Source of Truth
Integrate and centralize data from multiple tools and create your single source of truth.
## Ready to take control of your business?
[Get Demo](https://usebluelight.com/<https:/calendly.com/bluelight-dixon/discovery-call>)
![Chart showing revenue performance vs. goal.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/6691985a4992dc540c416946_card-revenue-performance.png)
![Card showing total revenue performance.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/66919468544487bf3550a680_card-total-revenue.png)
## Frequently asked questions
Is there a free trial available?
We do not offer a free trial, but we do offer a 3 month pilot period. During this time you will be assigned a dedicated implementation manager to ensure everything is delivered 100% to your satisfaction.
Do you integrate with Service Titan?
Yes, our most popular integration is with Service Titan. We even handle multiple Service Titan integrations helping our larger customers achieve a true single source of truth. We also integrate weather, demographic, and other proprietary data sources to deliver cutting edge insights.
How much does Bluelight cost?
Our pricing varies depending on your size and use case. We extend quantity discounts to larger customers so that you receive an economy of scale as you grow with our product.
Can you get us [insert metric here]?
Yes. We cover >95% of required metrics for each new customer out of the box. We offer a 3 month pilot period as an opportunity for us to prove that we can deliver any data request you have.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66910c2e1166f41957a3049c/676ec27dd127d260d87d9ed2_logo-master-black.svg)](https://usebluelight.com/</>)

generated_description:
**Bluelight: Empowering Home Service Contractors with Real-Time Analytics**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from the San Francisco Bay Area as a proud graduate of Y Combinator Batch W21, Bluelight is transforming the way home service contractors operate. Their mission? To provide analytics specifically built for the trades, enabling businesses to make data-driven decisions and unlock their true potential.

At its core, Bluelight equips home service contractors with real-time data that empowers them to optimize their operations and scale effectively. They understand the unique challenges faced by these businesses—juggling daily tasks while trying to glean insights from disparate sources can be frustrating. That's where they come in, offering a streamlined solution that integrates all necessary data into one easy-to-use platform.

### Key Features:
1. **Daily Huddle**: Conduct efficient operational reviews with real-time reporting.
2. **Budget & Goal Tracking**: Measure the impact of key business drivers on your revenue growth.
3. **Capacity Planning**: Use proprietary demand forecasting to capture more revenue.
4. **Demand Forecasts**: Predict future demand to allocate resources effectively.
5. **Real-time Metrics**: Get insights that are always current and relevant to your operations.
6. **Single Source of Truth**: Centralize data from various tools, creating a comprehensive overview of your business metrics.

Bluelight’s intuitive platform is designed to help contractors plan, optimize, and grow their revenue without getting bogged down in the complexities of legacy reporting systems. Trusted by leading shops in the industry, Bluelight has quickly become a go-to resource for contractors looking to modernize their operations.

With a small but mighty team of just two employees, led by partners with deep industry insight, they embrace the belief that powerful analytics should be accessible without disrupting day-to-day operations. 

### Commitment to Customers
Bluelight offers a tailored three-month pilot period to ensure customer satisfaction and adaptation to their unique metrics needs. They're flexible, allowing integration with popular systems like Service Titan and even extending their capabilities to include weather and demographic data.

If you're a home service contractor and want to take your business to the next level, Bluelight is worth exploring. With their straightforward approach to analytics, you can finally have the confidence you need to make better decisions fast. Interested in seeing what Bluelight can do for your business? [Get a demo today!](https://usebluelight.com/)
